phrase: I can't get this ulcer to heal
It just seemed a little blister and I picked at it and it did get a little bit red and infected
I went on some antibiotics [Keflex], it seemed to get better but nothing is really making it go away
No pain but I don’t have much feeling in my foot
There has been a lot more drainage and I just feel a little more tired
Blood sugars are running better than they were but still in the two hundreds
1 by 2 centimeter wound on the dorsal aspect of the lateral foot... yellow slough... minimal granulation tissue... no surrounding erythema or cellulitis... no bony exposure... no odor
Order an ABI to determine blood supply
Prescribe colaganase ointment... cover with sterile dressing
Get you a surgical shoe to take pressure off the area
Follow-up in two weeks for re-evaluation
I’ll probably be walking around at the zoo... eating out and not doing anything my doctor wants me to do
